General.Name: Gateley (Holdings) Plc
General.Description: Gateley (Holdings) Plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial legal and consultancy services in the United Kingdom, Europe, the Middle East, North and South America, Asia, and internationally. It operates through five segments: Banking and Financial Services; Corporate; Business Services; Employees, Pensions and Benefits; and Property. The company offers a range of services, such as legal, banking, corporate, restructuring advisory, taxation, commercial, commercial dispute resolution/litigation, and tweed services. It also provides employment, pension, and private client services; and real estate, real estate dispute resolution, construction, and planning services. In addition, the company offers pension trustee services; specialist property, human capital, and investment consultancy services; architecture, building surveyance, civil and structural engineering services; patent attorney and employee benefit trust services; and corporate investment and trustee services. It serves housebuilders, industrial, logistic, recruitment, retail, hospitality, and sports business, as well as in-house, general counsel, governing bodies, and universities. The company was formerly known as Gateley Plc and changed its name to Gateley (Holdings) Plc in May 2015. Gateley (Holdings) Plc was founded in 1808 and is based in Birmingham, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: One Eleven Edmund Street, Birmingham, United Kingdom, B3 2HJ
